en: You're reviewing some of the work you've done on your product previously, and a realization hits you: this early stuff isn't that good. You've already surpassed your initial skill set.
This idea hits you hard, and you don't know whether to celebrate or double down.
This is a great thing! You decide to celebrate your success. Taking the time to do that gives you a huge boost that carries you through the day.
Seeing how far you've come makes you want to push even harder - where will you be in six months? Or a year? Motivated, you plunge right back into work.
